body.p: Dear Sir discover since I came home from the Army of the Potomac that there is a large number of Guerillas on the border here and it is reposted that they are doing considerable amount of damage and I have heard that you want to have the State cleared of them and also I am informed that one Capt Willson is in Davis or Ohio County and is troubling them that is the Guerillas Now the object of my writing to you is to know how you want men to operate on what terms time pay and so forth Some
Now Sir as I have Served three years in the Cavalry I think I know something about the management of mounted men and scouting and so on.

I have thought since I came back that if I could get a command or a commission to command a company I would go in for awhil and I think I can raise fifty or one hundred men in a few days there is several men here that has been compelled to leave your State that say that they would like to help put the Guerillas out of the way and would like to go in you will please answer this you will send to me in Gentryville Spencer County
State of Indiana

I am verry respectfully yours
James V McKasson
P, S, Referances of character and Qualifications can be given if required

State of Indiana
Spencer co Genrtyville
July 18th 1864
McKasson, Jas. V.

writes to the Govr to Know on what terms, time, pay & c he wants men to serve agst guerillas. wants a com,s,n. Can get 50 men, some of them refugees from Ky wants an answer immediately com'n'c'n refrd by Govr to Inspr Genl

Answered July 22 -- 1864
On Letter. Book Page 522.
